name: INsIdE BOX
description:
You are inside a box and have move yourself in order to keep gaining points as you go along passing through each segment. Your goal is to stay in the box while gaining more points as you go along.

E - to switch to free camera instead of locked perspective.

WASD/ARROW KEYS to move;

W/up - is to thrust upwards while on the ground

S/down - is to thrust downwards while on the ground

ESC - pause menu

SETTINGS OPTION IS NOT COMPLETE.
